scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/mainnet.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
scripts.prepare:arb: mustache config/arb.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/arb.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
scripts.prepare:arb1: mustache config/arb1.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/arb1.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
